dict.string:
# In order to add or remove tabs to be openned # go check the function getItemsForSABnzbd() in suggest.rb
ruby suggest.rb
Open SABnzbd with other tabs, use alt+enter to quit SABnzbd and close tabs

on alfred_script(q) tell application "SABnzbd" activate delay 1 end tell tell application "Google Chrome" -- This list contain the URL of the tab you want to open -- add or remove any URL of your choice set listeTabToOpen to my explode(" ", q) -- This list will be used to check if one of the tabs -- in the listeTabToOpen has to be openned set listTabOpenned to {} ---------------------------------------------- -- Open a window if no window is openned ---------------------------------------------- if ((count every window) is equal to 0) then make new window end if ---------------------------------------------- -- init the boolean list ---------------------------------------------- repeat with i from 1 to (count of listeTabToOpen) by 1 set listTabOpenned to listTabOpenned & true end repeat ---------------------------------------------- -- Get to know if the tabs in the listeTabToOpen -- are already openned ---------------------------------------------- repeat with theWindow in every window repeat with theTab in every tab of theWindow repeat with i from 1 to (count of listeTabToOpen) by 1 if ((item i of listeTabToOpen) is equal to (theTab's URL)) then set item i of listTabOpenned to false end if end repeat end repeat end repeat ---------------------------------------------- -- Open the tab in the listeTabToOpen -- that are not open ---------------------------------------------- repeat with i from 1 to (count of listeTabToOpen) by 1 set elem to item i of listTabOpenned if (elem is equal to true) then set newTab to item i of listeTabToOpen tell window 1 to make new tab with properties {URL:newTab} end if end repeat
activate end tell end alfred_script
-- i found this wonderfull function on the net ;) -- go check their work if you are interested -- e.g. explode("-", "a-b-c") --> {"a", "b", "c"} on explode(delimiter, input) -- ljr (http://applescript.bratis-lover.net/library/string/), -- modified from Applescript.net (http://bbs.applescript.net/viewtopic.php?id=18377) local delimiter, input, ASTID set ASTID to AppleScript's text item delimiters try set AppleScript's text item delimiters to delimiter set input to text items of input set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID return input --> list on error eMsg number eNum set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID error "Can't explode: " & eMsg number eNum end try end explode

on alfred_script(q) tell application "Google Chrome" set listeTabToOpen to my explode(" ", q) ---------------------------------------------- -- Close the tab in the listeTabToOpen that are open ---------------------------------------------- repeat with i from (count of windows) to 1 by -1 repeat with j from (count of tabs of window i) to 1 by -1 set thistab to tab j of window i set titleTab to URL of thistab if (listeTabToOpen contains titleTab) then close thistab end if end repeat end repeat end tell
tell application "SABnzbd" quit end tell end alfred_script
-- i found this wonderfull function on the net ;) -- go check their work if you are interested -- e.g. explode("-", "a-b-c") --> {"a", "b", "c"} on explode(delimiter, input) -- ljr (http://applescript.bratis-lover.net/library/string/), -- modified from Applescript.net (http://bbs.applescript.net/viewtopic.php?id=18377) local delimiter, input, ASTID set ASTID to AppleScript's text item delimiters try set AppleScript's text item delimiters to delimiter set input to text items of input set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID return input --> list on error eMsg number eNum set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID error "Can't explode: " & eMsg number eNum end try end explode

##################### #### Version 1.0 #### #####################
TO DO: - Being able not to open the SABnzbd tab twice. - Close all tab whatever the reason is. - Change the declaration of the different URL (script filter) - fix the issue that SAB doesn't open with applescript
##################### #### DESCRIPTION #### #####################
This workflow allows you to open the application SABnzbd and also open tabs you want to open in order to download .nzb files.
You will also be able to close all of the opened tabs by this workflow.
###################### #### INSTALLATION #### ######################
In order to use this workflow you will need to install SABnzbd: http://sabnzbd.org/
And you will also need a newsgroup provider like: http://usenetstorm.com/
I show this one because it has a free service but there is a lot of them so choose wisely.
################################ #### USAGE OF THIS WORKFLOW #### ################################
Set the list of other tabs in the script filter (to be done)
sab {query}
if (ALT button is also pressed) { close SABnzbd and tabs from the list } else { open SABnzbd and tabs from the list }
############################# #### CREDITS / COPYRIGHT #### #############################
If you have some suggestions or bug report email me @ alfredlotl (at) gmail (dot) com
